template.name: Modal View
template.t:
<!DOCTYPE html>
Vote for Pi Network Games from Latin America in Pi Brainstorm.
We won an Honorable mention!!!:
Pi Hackathon Announcement
Watch the Pi Core Team tweet
* LatinChain Platform (Games from Latin America for Pi).
* Use this link to join Pi Network: https://minepi.com/rockcesar
* Use this code to join Pi Network: rockcesar
(Remember clear the Pi Browser cache if it is not working well).
Thank you very much!.

template.name: Mainnet redirect View
template.t:
<!DOCTYPE html>
                
                    

                        
                        
                        
                        LatinChain Redirect.
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                          window._taboola = window._taboola || [];
                          _taboola.push({article:'auto'});
                          !function (e, f, u, i) {
                            if (!document.getElementById(i)){
                              e.async = 1;
                              e.src = u;
                              e.id = i;
                              f.parentNode.insertBefore(e, f);
                            }
                          }(document.createElement('script'),
                          document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0],
                          '//cdn.taboola.com/libtrc/latinchain-publisher/loader.js',
                          'tb_loader_script');
                          if(window.performance && typeof window.performance.mark == 'function')
                            {window.performance.mark('tbl_ic');}
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    

                    
                        

                            

                            

                                We are testing LatinChain Mainnet on Pi Network cryptocurrency ecosystem. Get double utility usage bonus  by using both Mainnet and Testnet.
                                

                                

                            
                            
Click here
(Go to LatinChain Mainnet)
                            
                            

                            Return to LatinChain Testnet
                            
                            

                            

                            

                                
                                
                                
                                
                                     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
                                
                                
                                

                                
                                

                                
                                  window._taboola = window._taboola || [];
                                  _taboola.push({
                                    mode: 'alternating-thumbnails-a',
                                    container: 'taboola-below-article-thumbnails',
                                    placement: 'Below Article Thumbnails',
                                    target_type: 'mix'
                                  });
                                
                            
                        
                        





                        
                        
                    
                        
                        
                        
                          window._taboola = window._taboola || [];
                          _taboola.push({flush: true});

template.name: Reading club View
template.t:
<!DOCTYPE html>
                
                    

                        
                        
                        
                        Reading Club
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            $( document ).ready(function() {
                                $(".open_streaming_playlist").click(function(){
                                    var streaming_url = $(this).attr("videourl");
                                    $.colorbox({width: "80%", height: "80%", maxWidth: "80%", maxHeight: "80%", html:''});
                                });
                            });
                        
                    

                    
                        

                            

                            
Welcome to the reading club: Literary, Sci-Fi and other genres books to read.
                            

                            

                                
 
podcasts

and

template.name: Certification View
template.t:
<!DOCTYPE html>
Certification
User has to be verified in LatinChain Platform to show the certification. Not verified yet.
Current time:
UTC.
This info refers to:
Mainnet (https://latinchain.pinet.com)
Testnet (https://latinchaintest9869.pinet.com)

template.name: Ask an Expert View
template.t:
<!DOCTYPE html>
Ask an Expert
Current time:
UTC.
This is a list of LatinChain Platform (latin-chain.com) experts, among of them there are Social Networks experts, Computer Scientists and other interesting professions, from around the World. Check it out!.
Now you can consult an Expert if you need their services:
Professionals
Csar Cordero Rodrguez
Rita Nguyen
Jonathan Garcia Barroso
Marina Molechino
Adrian Latorre
